text.title: Islamic State execute 21 Coptic Christians held in Libya
text.head: Islamic State execute 21 Coptic Christians held in Libya
Sources

list.item: "ISIL video shows Christian Egyptians beheaded in Libya" — Al-Jazeera , February 16, 2015
"Islamic State: Egyptian Christians held in Libya 'killed'" — BBC News Online , February 15, 2015
